Channel 123 ([[List of channels on UPC Romania (Standard Digital)|digital]])| |}} '''Disney Junior Romania''' is a television block that airs on Disney Channel Romania from 2:00 p.m. till 3:45 p.m., and is available in English and Romanian. Playhouse Disney Romania was re-branded as [[Disney Junior]] on June 1, 2011. It is the new kids aimed programming block on [[Disney Channel Romania]]. ==Shows== * [[Handy Manny]] * [[Special Agent Oso]] * [[My Friends Tigger & Pooh]] * [[Mickey Mouse Clubhouse]] * [[Little Einsteins]] * [[Jake and the Never Land Pirates]] * [[Jungle Junction]] * [[Imagination Movers (TV series)|Imagination Movers]] * [[The Hive (TV show) |The Hive]] ==See also== *[[Disney Channel Romania]] ==References== {{Reflist|2}} ==External links== {{Portalbox|Romania|Media}} {{Disney Channel}} [[Category:Romanian television networks]] [[ro:Playhouse Disney]]
